text: Pleasant Point is a small country town in the Timaru District, New Zealand. It is situated some 19 kilometers inland from Timaru on State Highway 8. It has two primary schools and the high school was closed down in 2004 by the Labour Government. In March 1986 the town suffered from one of the worst floods in history. == References == Category:Towns in Canterbury Region Category:Timaru District
title: Pleasant Point, New Zealand
